contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=July 2009}} {{Notability|date=July 2009}} '''Dechko Uzunov''' ({{lang-bg|Дечко Узунов}}) (February 22, 1899 – April 26, 1986) was a [[Bulgaria]]n [[Painting|painter]]. He was born in [[Kazanluk]] and died in [[Sofia]] at the age of 87. {{Authority control|VIAF=55208244}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Uzunov, Dechko | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Bulgarian painter | DATE OF BIRTH = February 22, 1899 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = April 26, 1986 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Uzunov, Dechko}} [[Category:1899 births]] [[Category:1986 deaths]] [[Category:Bulgarian painters]] [[Category:Members of the Bulgarian Academy of Sciences]] [[Category:People from Kazanlak]] [[Category:20th-century Bulgarian people]] [[Category:20th-century painters]] {{Bulgaria-painter-stub}}
